scripts.playwright: npm run build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.playwright.yml up --build
scripts.test: CLIENT_ID=test COOKIE_SECRET=9e464d6f34cca8bec64d370770ab1fd151ded85fe8a0f5a7dbd00f11675a9db7 mocha -r ts-node/register tests/*.spec.ts && SUPPRESS_DPOP_CHECK=true CLIENT_ID=test COOKIE_SECRET=9e464d6f34cca8bec64d370770ab1fd151ded85fe8a0f5a7dbd00f11675a9db7 mocha -r ts-node/register tests/refresh-token.spec.ts
